actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to provide for the regulation of sample drugs.

summary.text: Sample Drug Regulation Act of 1979 - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require the labeling and control of sample prescription drugs. Deems misbranded any such sample drug not so labeled. Limits the distribution of such drugs, and requires manufacturers, processors, distributors, and dispensers to maintain accurate records accessible to investigation by the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to provide for the regulation of sample drugs.
